import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // Try to get google auth working here for fun if possible export default function User({setAuth,setName,setEmail,name,email}) { function handleName(e){ setName(e.target.value) } function handleEmail(e){ setEmail(e.target.value) } function handleClick(){ setAuth(true); const userObj = { name: name, email: email } fetch('http://localhost:3000/users',{ method:'POST', headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(userObj) }) .then(r=>r.json()) .then(data=>console.log(data)) .catch(error=>console.log(error)) // handle your post request here. } return ( <> {/* This example requires updating your template: ``` ``` */} {/* See how the error handling / form handling works */} {/* Also set it so the facebook github etc. logos don't work. if you can integrate google auth that would be cool since for sure will do in future. */}
{/* Above figure out what image we want to use */}

Create an Account

Or{' '} {/* Use history to make this a goback button to either about or home dpeending on where at. Set state for nav bar accordingly.*/} Go Back

{/* eliminating the default HTML form submission to make a dumb onClick version for simplicity sake. */} {/* action="http://localhost:3001/app" method="POST" */}
{/*
